about.title: About
about.text1: My name is Wilmar Rodriguez, I'm 27 years old, I'm originally from Colombia and I'm a Full-Stack Web developer with an Academlo degree.
about.text2: From a very young age I have been interested in new technologies and their essential structure, both hardware and software, as well as the functionality of programs and applications for computers and mobile devices.
about.text3: I mainly dedicate myself to creating audiovisual projects on PC, I like to play videogames, read general culture internet articles, relevant news and I really like electronic music.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: In this section some of my projects are shown, you can visit each one through the 'Demo' button, you can also see the code of each one with the 'Code' button

card.description1: Imitation of Instagram aimed at companies to offer their products and services
card.description2: Random Quote Generator, with color options and Twitter sharing
card.description3: Project inspired by the popular TV series, based on the Rick and Morty API
card.description4: Application that displays weather information based on the OpenWeatherMap API
card.description5: Users CRUD project, with options to create, edit, delete and read all users from a database

card.description1: Design and development of web pages and applications, from an idea to a complete application, with a responsive design and optimized for all devices.
card.description2: Development and maintenance of SQL and NoSQL databases, with a software architecture, query and process optimization.
card.description3: Design, development and consumption of API Rest using NodeJS, Express and MongoDB according to the needs of the client.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text1: Want to know more about my work or have any questions?
